### Load the data

Checking if the data folder is there and if not, creates it and writes the loaded data file.

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)

project_root <- here()
data_dir <- here("data")
if (!dir.exists(data_dir)) dir.create(data_dir)

input_file <- here("_raw", "kidney_disease.csv")
output_file <- here("data", "01_data_load.csv")

read_csv(input_file) |> write_csv(output_file)


```
